element.name: ttmlrender
element.description: Renders timed-text subtitles on top of video buffers
element.author: David Schleef <ds@schleef.org>, Zeeshan Ali <zeeshan.ali@nokia.com>, Chris Bass <dash@rd.bbc.co.uk>
